message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product of exceptional value. Given its potential, I believe a starting price of $1,150,000 is fair. This leaves us room for a mutually beneficial negotiation.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,000,000. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
Bob, I understand your position, but my absolute floor for this product is $1,100,000. This is a very competitive price considering its value to you. Let me know if this works for you.
Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $1,050,000. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
